body: I tend to dislike male dom (alpha) attitudes in general but this has got some interesting plot, silly as it might be. The art is wonderfully pleasant, beautiful, & consistent. Highly recommended reading (and fapping material if you want to).

Finally, someone who can take high risk decisions without being stupid and don't preparing countermeasures beforehand. I love this MC, he's just have a criminal mentality. He tries to understand perfectly his abilities, their limits and improving himself while having his twisted fun, without making foolishness moves. I am loving the plot, I'm enjoying everything. I'm not a fervent lover of NTR, but when I see one that sparkles with such a good plot, it's impossible for me to not love it. Thank you for translating this.
"I dont think a simple janitor could do anything too bad though"........... LOL this guy doesn't read doujins.
This slow corruption series is nice, I hope there’s a next episode out soo

Guys, it's still NTR if the MC only pushes them into choosing someone else not making the decision for them, or zapping them to love the protagonist or W/E. Also, some people are disregarding the corruption aspect to his actions. He's trying to gain XP so the goal isn't just zap them into sex, it's to make them naturally desire it
This series has been good so far on the hypnosis and slow corruption of each girl.
Is this the last one or is there gonna be more?
A strange chapter, but he is limit testing so far! Hope we get more and more chapters!
Nahh this one is a huge miss, There is no meaning of it If She thinks She is having s.x with her love the whole time. The pleasure comes from them trying to resist
a lot of mind control lately and they just slap the ntr tag on for reasons, it not ntr if she is being mind-controlled lol
This doujin gonna be on front page despite ppl hating it .Trust
